div.div: Lake Forest College vs. Lawrence University
at Appleton, Wis. | The Banta Bowl

tr.td: LFC wins toss and will receive. LU to defend south end zone.
Pat O'Mahoney kickoff 56 yards to the LFC9, Alex Pasiewicz return 36 yards to the LFC45 (Tyler Lueck).
Mike Lewis pass complete to George Vidas for 5 yards to the 50 yardline (Zach Eichhorst).
Alec Howe rush for 2 yards to the LU48 (Andy Paider).
Mike Lewis pass incomplete to Mike Rantis.
Jon Gurchak punt 29 yards to the LU19, fair catch by Sam Wagner.
LukeBarthelmess rush for 19 yards to the LU38, 1ST DOWN LU (Bryce Jones).
